channel.title: Rojhat Sinan Balka
channel.description: Recent content on Rojhat Sinan Balka

item.description: Software Engineer Summary Rojhat Sinan Balka, self-taught software engineer with expertise in backend development of Go microservices and gRPC communication. Contact Name: Rojhat Sinan Balka Email: rojbalka@gmail.com LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/roj Github: https://github.com/rosiba Location: Istanbul, Turkey Experience Medipol Health Group ERP Developer (2024-Present) Wrote Oracle SQL queries to generate financial reports. Used Oracle OTBI to generate invetory management analysis. Symphony Lead Software Engineer (2022-2023) Led 6 person team to design, develop and deliver software.
